description.p: TorrServer is a program that allows users to view torrents online without the need for preliminary file downloading. The core functionality of TorrServer includes caching torrents and subsequent data transfer via the HTTP protocol, allowing the cache size to be adjusted according to the system parameters and the user's internet connection speed. It features:

ul.li: Integration with other apps through API

description.p: Running: start the app shortcut and open the printed link in the browser.

ul.li: Documentation has been added to the openapi server, accessible from the server via the path IP:PORT/swagger/index.html
Added generation/use of certificates, the server can be started via https
